arts.ttl: Neymar takes a giant step on his journey to full activity
arts.sum: Neymar is edging towards his return to participating in competitive games with his Al Hilal side with the Brazilian absent since October 2023 after he sustained a knee injury that forced him to undergo surgery. Despite no definitive date for a return to full first team activity, the striker returned to training with his Al Hilal teammates this Sunday and was anxious to share this step with his legion of fans on social media .

arts.ttl: Neymar decides next club as Al-Hilal contract nears end
arts.sum: Neymar will not renew his contract at Al-Hilal. The Brazilian forward joined the Saudi Pro League side last year after leaving Paris Saint-Germain. The contract the 32-year-old signed was only two years and is due to expire at the end of the season.
